name: api-testday
description: Your objective is to create a web service, which provides an REST API to perform CRUD data operations , i.e. creating, reading, updating and deleting shops stored in an SQL database. The structure of the API is defined in the specification, which you can find **[here](https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis/heu-pilsen/testday-api/1.0.1)**.
